com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.navigation.camera

Class SimpleCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.navigation.camera.Camera
      • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.navigation.camera.SimpleCamera

  • public class SimpleCamera
extends Camera
    The default camera used by MapboxNavigation.
    Since:
    0.10.0

      • tilt

        public double tilt(RouteInformation routeInformation)
        Description copied from class: Camera
        The angle, in degrees, of the camera angle from the nadir (directly facing the Earth). See tilt(float) for details of restrictions on the range of values.
        Specified by:
        tilt in class Camera

      • zoom

        public double zoom(RouteInformation routeInformation)
        Description copied from class: Camera
        Zoom level near the center of the screen. See zoom(float) for the definition of the camera's zoom level.
        Specified by:
